infotexts.entitydescription.helmetsw1: Modified coalition ballistic helmet. Part of the «O.C.A. Special Suit» kit (Omnidirectional Combined Armor).
infotexts.entitydescription.helmetsw2: Modified coalition ballistic helmet. Part of the «O.C.A. Special Suit» kit (Omnidirectional Combined Armor). A flashlight has been added.
infotexts.entitydescription.helmetsw3: Modified coalition ballistic helmet. Part of the «O.C.A. Special Suit» kit (Omnidirectional Combined Armor). A flashlight has been added. Slightly modified, using an Underwater Mask.
infotexts.entitydescription.helmetsb1: Modified coalition ballistic helmet. Part of the «O.C.A. Special Suit» kit (Omnidirectional Combined Armor).

infotexts.entitydescription.divingsuitprototypew1: Old style wetsuit model O.R.C.A. (Omnidirectional Anti-Radiation Combined Armor). Withstands pressure up to 4000 meters.

infotexts.entitydescription.divingsuitprototypeb2: Old style wetsuit model М-O.R.C.A. (Modified - Omnidirectional Anti-Radiation Combined Armor). Built-in old style MC (Mechanical Counter-Pressure). Withstands pressure up to 6000 meters.

infotexts.entitydescription.divingsuitprototypeb3: Old style wetsuit model E-O.R.C.A. (Experimentally - Omnidirectional Anti-Radiation Combined Armor). Built-in old-style MC (Mechanical Counter-Pressure)). For faster movement, a compartment for nuclear fuel was added. Withstands pressure up to 10000 meters.

Built-in old-style MC (Mechanical Counter-Pressure). For faster movement, a compartment for nuclear fuel was added. Withstands pressure up to 10000 meters.

infotexts.entitydescription.backpacksequipmentw1: Assault Kit «Lightweight». The design has small-sized main compartments for carrying weapons, as well as medium and small-sized items.

infotexts.entitydescription.backpacksequipmentw2: Assault Kit «Standard». The design has large-sized main compartments for carrying weapons, as well as medium and small-sized items.
infotexts.entitydescription.backpacksequipmentb2: Assault Kit «Standard». The design has large-sized main compartments for carrying weapons, as well as medium and small-sized items.
infotexts.entitydescription.backpacksequipmentw3: Assault Kit «Heavy». The design has spacious main compartments for carrying weapons, as well as medium and small-sized items.
infotexts.entitydescription.backpacksequipmentb3: Assault Kit «Heavy». The design has spacious main compartments for carrying weapons, as well as medium and small-sized items.
infotexts.entitydescription.handheldstatusmonitor2: Allows you to remotely monitor the condition of the submarine hull and electrics.
infotexts.entityname.handheldstatusmonitor3: Handheld Status Monitor end Handheld Itemfinder
infotexts.entitydescription.handheldstatusmonitor3: The improved version allows you to remotely monitor the condition of the submarine hull, electrics and search for items.
